name: lms-website
description: - To Implement React Counter:     **npm i react-countup**  - To Implement React Router Dom    **npm i react-router-dom** - To Implement label from shadcn/ui    **npx shadcn@latest add label** - To Implement Input    **npx shadcn@latest add input** -To Implement Radio     **npx shadcn@latest add radio-group** -To Implement Card    **npx shadcn@latest add card**
